Method Detail

addCreature

void addCreature(SeaLife creature,
                 double certainty)
Add the presence of a creature to the square, along with the certainty that it is on the square.

Get the creatures thought to be on this square, along with the certainty of its presence.

getExpectedDanger

setExpectedHappiness

void setExpectedHappiness(double happiness)
Set the expected happiness value for this square. Note: this includes subtracting the danger associated with this square.

getExpectedHappiness

double getExpectedHappiness()
Get the expected happiness value for this square. Note: this includes subtracting the danger associated with this square.

clear

void clear()
Reset the square. This should be called at the start of each tick, and should remove all happiness on the square that is not due to the existence of stationary creatures. It should also remove all divers and nonstationary creatures from the corresponding sets.
